item.description:
Tuesday August 16, 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm
Christopher Columbus Park

  (Boston Water Front)

Waterfront Arts Series

"Chu Lin Dance Company"

This event is free. Bring your family and friends.

Take the blueline to The Aqarium or the greenline to Government Center and walk over. Right next to The Boston Marriot Long Wharf Hotel and The Joe's American Bar and Grille. Restaurant

Bring a picnic dinner or buy something on the way if you like.  There  is a vendor there to buy food or you can check out Starbucks in side the Hotel or find a place to eat with others after the event.

Make sure to Bring a blanket or lawn chair to sit in too.
item.how_to_find_us: I will hold a sign saying Chinese Language Meetup.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Chu Lin Dance Company @ The Christopher Columbus Waterfront Park
